articles.description: Birmingham City won for the ninth time in 11 visits to Ashton Gate - a 2-1 victory giving Blues fans a real boost
articles.content:
It was nervy at times, it always is, but Birmingham City created an early two goal lead and converted it into three points to extend their fabulous record at Ashton Gate.
